website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably-priced model with useful features and a bundle of accessories that make it a solid deal.
pros: Easy to use and set up
Smart technology keeps you updated with the latest maps and search results
Comes in a bundle that includes a stylus, screen cleaning cloths, screen protectors, and a storage case
cons: Occasional reports of units that suddenly failed to power on or turned off unexpectedly

customer_reviews.title: Might buy another one for my other truck
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gps. I use it everyday for work. Its much faster than the older models. The mount works well, along with trip advisor and letting you know where most of the red light cameras are. Voice command works pretty good along as there not a loud truck in the background.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: KEEP IT PLUGGED IN
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first GPS in 2010 and remember the charge lasting days for most of those years. So I was shocked when this device lost power after only one hour of use........until I called Garmin. The rep said that that was normal for all auto Garmins built from 2016 on. I concluded that that was likely because of all the bells and whistle on newer models, compared to my 9 year old antique. She agreed. I've only used it once so can't give expert opinions, still it was programmed in less than 5 minutes got me where I needed to go without any problems. I shall update the feedback soon
customer_reviews.author: Lori M.

customer_reviews.title: It is Perfect for downloading my deliveries for my Fed Ex route
customer_reviews.text: It is Perfect for downloading my deliveries for my Fed Ex route! My contractor has a special cord made for the scanners. He connects the scanner to my Garmin and it routes all the deliveries!
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Manual is such small print it’s impossible to read. If it has capability of voice activated commands I have no clue how to make that work. The suction cup to hold in place mounted doesn’t stick to anything at all so now I have to purchase another kind of mount and hope it works. Battery life short lived.
customer_reviews.author: okistampqueen

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features I didn’t like.
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Garmin that I like well enough. The Garmin Drive Smart has a much more sensitive touch screen, which is a good thing. It has a lot of features that sounded good when I placed my order but I discovered I didn’t need or like them. There’s a feature that notifies you of speed zone changes that will drive you nuts! It changes and beeps almost continually. To use the live traffic updates you need a special cable and pay a fee for the service. Not worth it for me. Anyway, you might love these things and if so, you’ll love this Garmin. I didn’t like them and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: L. B. Lear

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: It works. I think I like the older Nuvi model I have better though. Seems as though companies are trying to hard to reinvent the wheel. If a product isn't broke then don't try to fix it! Update: after a little over a month of using this - it will just stop working while I am driving. This is absolutely the worst GPS. I did my research and if this is the best then that is horrible. Try your luck on another gps!!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Good product and nice features
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and enjoy to using it. As matter of fact, I bought two of Garmin DriveSmart 51 NA LMT-S Advanced unit for my two cars. I highly recommend this GPS and I bought it from Beach Camera, excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lo

customer_reviews.title: Garmin drivesmart 51 is not smart.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable this is supposed to be better than the older version. Unfortunately I don't like it. If you picked the fastest route it will always take you to the freeways putting more mileage and time. If you picked the shortest it will take you forever. The software ware is bad not a practical ways. I am disappointed. I hope Garmin can fixed these, no wonder they have so many return.
customer_reviews.author: rene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Garmin GPS
customer_reviews.text: My second Garmin. Love the way these operate. Clear accurate directions. Better than the navigation system that came with my vehicle which the manufacturers charge a fortune to update your maps. The Garmin comes with Lifetime Map updates. Trust Garmin. Also excellent price for all you get.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Independent

customer_reviews.title: Unsure of total performance
customer_reviews.text: I am unsure of the total performance of this Garmin GPS, as I live outside NA, and have yet to use it during my trips to Canada, USA and/or Mexico. However, this is my 3rd Garmin, and I am normally satisfied in all aspects; and in setting up this new GPS, the improvement over past models is evident.
customer_reviews.author: Ted & Doris

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: The Garmin I replaced was 8 years old....I wish I would have done it sooner. I love the voice commands for hands free driving. It has no difficulty understanding my voice and is very clear to those who are listening to me talk on it. It is different than my old one but was very easy to learn to use.
customer_reviews.author: leigh

customer_reviews.title: I'll be returning this
customer_reviews.text: It's useless to me. It selects one route, you're stuck with unless you "build a trip." Even then it didn't work. The robot helper stated there is no guarantee the unit will recognize other routes. Really a 1,300 mile trip, and Garmin can only find one route. No user guide, not even a small basic instruction sheet... oh except for the instructions on how to install the suction cup... what a waste of time and money and I really needed a GPS for trip. Thanks for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: bought for older relative
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Garmin for senior citizen Dad. It replaced his old Garmin in his beloved truck. He says it works great and it was any easy transition from the older model, just the right amount of bells and whistles without being overdone for an Octogenarian!
customer_reviews.author: PoeGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Great GPS that is easy to use. All the commands are intuitive and familiar with previous Garmins.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J.

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the Accessories
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself is pretty good, but that accompanying accessories are junk and were not what was advertised. I bought this unit for the combined components.
customer_reviews.author: Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Excellent GPS
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Used for 1600 miles on trip. Flawless, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great features
customer_reviews.text: So many great features on this upgrade! My husband is totally pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Nana07

customer_reviews.title: Product as described.
customer_reviews.text: Just received product and it is as described in the posting. The dual 12V car charger is not very good as it comes loose easily disconnecting power to the Garmin but does the job by giving me another port to connect another device to.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Only complain, cord is too short but amazing gps
customer_reviews.text: Everything on this GPS is amazing but u do have to buy another cord. The cord it comes with is a little over a foot. With that length I couldn't even put in my cup holder and charging port in my car is next to it. The screen protector that it comes with is a very fine plastic sheet.
customer_reviews.author: brandy keller

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great my 4th garmin hasn’t disappointed me yet
customer_reviews.author: Karen P Hoven

customer_reviews.title: battery issues
customer_reviews.text: im giving this a three star because the unit is ok, but it practically has no battery life. If they could fix this issue,it would be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: chrisskierka

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and live the touch screen and extra hard drive
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Seller, no communication!
customer_reviews.text: No manual, no communication! Sure hope this Garmin GPS works down the road!
customer_reviews.author: Diddy4

customer_reviews.title: Great GPS
customer_reviews.text: Nice product! Bought this to replace an older Magellan product. Works excellent. Glad I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Vreeland

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: Constant traffic updates. Wish they had a Re -Route button. Speak from the Garmin fo answer phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable produ ct
customer_reviews.text: Been using Garmin GPS products for over 10 years and have been very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Frosty

customer_reviews.title: On Monday I shipped it back Tuesday at work for about five minutes diss appointed in the product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got my garmin the mail On Monday I shipped it back Tuesday at work for about five minutes diss appointed in the product
customer_reviews.author: Al Marshall

customer_reviews.title: havent used yet
customer_reviews.text: Oweners manual could be more detailed . if you dont have online acess your in trouble
customer_reviews.author: M. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Visual and speed in changing options.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it but can"t see it well. Still can"t save an address
customer_reviews.author: Pat rader

customer_reviews.title: doesnt hold charge
customer_reviews.text: never got it turn on charge it using the cable provided never charge the gps.
customer_reviews.author: walter marquez

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely refer this product. We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a Christmas gift for my husband and he loves it! Easy to operate. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Garmin! Great charge, works fast, accurate.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great navigator. It charges well, works fast, plug in your destination and go!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Very friendly GPS
customer_reviews.text: Super nice GPS. I have had several GPS in past but this one. is bluetooth and voice activated. Very friendly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garmin is the best out there
customer_reviews.text: I have done a lot of research before purchasing this GPS. I needed it mostly for Europe and purchased the appropriate country software to go with this Garmin. I used it locally and it works great. I am happy with it but time will tell if it works great in Italy! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Diane Sala

customer_reviews.title: I dont know what it could be used for
customer_reviews.text: Dislike, My wife used her iphone and it was as effective. This has no real purpose and its a pain to use. Have to put in the street number, then next screen the street name, then next screen the city and so forth. It might be more useful than a cell phone if you nav by coordinates Lon and Lat. For me, i tossed money out the window. I am going to give it to my son and burden him with it.
customer_reviews.author: half full

customer_reviews.title: Great GPS
customer_reviews.text: Awesome GPS, great crisp graphics, quick to pick up satellites, like the details the screen displays. I highly recommend this GPS. In addition, you can add a "back-up camera", which I did, to display on this GPS's screen. Can purchase some great accessories. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to program and understand
customer_reviews.text: Most are now using their phones but we still like to use a Garmin. This one is very nice and easy to use. Like the blue tooth to answer why phone through and the speed notification.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great GPS
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was expecting! Love all the little extras that came with the Garmin. Shipping was FAST! My order arrived much sooner than anticipated. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jan H.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: It was a replacement for one that broke and it was much better than I expected. I'm still learning all of the features but it will get you to your destination worry free. A lot of small things like telling you which two lanes to be in made the drive less stressful.
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD CHURCH

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Had an initial issue. The issue was quickly resolved. Now it works wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Fannon Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love my garmens.
customer_reviews.text: I am very fond of the Garman brand. I own and use four or five garmens I know I did not order another one. I have no idea how this item was added to my purchasing list. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this product a 5 had their been instructions to setting it up. There's a small printed booklet and I do mean small.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave home without it.
customer_reviews.text: Put it on my dash like a head’s up display. Had one previously but can’t find it, had to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: bill, NY State

product_meta.title: Garmin DriveSmart 51 NA LMT-S Advanced Navigation (010-01680-02) with Smart Features w/Accessories Bundle Includes, Dual 12V Car Charger for GPS, Screen Protectors, Protect & Stow Case Mini + More
product_meta.description: Advanced Navigation with Smart Features Easy-to-use GPS navigator with connected features and bright 5.0-inch capacitive touch  display Detailed maps of North America with free lifetime updates Provides real-time services such as live traffic and live parking Bluetooth calling, smart notifications and voice-activated navigation Built-in Wi-Fi for easy map and software updates Stay connected behind the wheel with Garmin DriveSmart, the navigator that features a collection of smart features in addition to helpful driver alerts and easy-to-follow directions. From hands-free calling and live traffic information to built-in Wi-Fi and more - the future is on your Garmin. Just look ahead and drive. Live Services for Your Drive Outsmart traffic jams with time-saving alternate routes or by avoiding them altogether. Then, with live information, spend less time circling the block to look for parking. For traffic alerts, relevant rerouting directions and up-to-date weather forecasts, download the Smartphone Link app, which connects your Garmin DriveSmart with your compatible smartphone. As you near your destination, take the stress out of parking by viewing pricing and availability trends for on-street public parking. The Smartphone Link app also enables LiveTrack, which lets drivers share their location so friends can track your whereabouts whether you are running errands around town or taking a long road trip. Putting the Smart in Smart Connectivity When you sync your Bluet...
feature_bullets: Garmin AUTHORIZED DEALER - Includes Full Garmin USA WARRANTY
DriveSmart 51 NA LMT-S Advanced Navigation with Smart Features

The DriveSmart 51 navigator is loaded with helpful driver alerts, live services and up-to-date content so you can always drive with confidence. The future is on your Garmin. Just look ahead and drive.
INCLUDED IN THE BOX:DriveSmart 51 NA LMT-S, Vehicle Suction Cup Mount, Vehicle Power Cable, USB Cable, Quick Start Manual
BUNDLE INCLUDES:DriveSmart 51 NA LMT-S, 12V Car Charger for GPS, 5 inch Universal GPS Navigation Protect and Stow Case, Microfiber Cleaning Cloth, Screen Protectors for LCD's (pack of 3), and Stylus

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars106 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
